<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Double-Q-Learning">Double Q Learning<a class="anchor-link" href="#Double-Q-Learning">&#182;</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">class</span> <span class="nc">DoubleQLearning</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">TD</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="sd">&quot;&quot;&quot;</span>
<span class="sd">    Double Q-learning, for estimating Q1  Q2  q*</span>
<span class="sd">    &quot;&quot;&quot;</span>
    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="fm">__init__</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">env</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">alpha</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">gamma</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.9</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">epsilon</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.3</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="nb">super</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="fm">__init__</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">env</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">alpha</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">gamma</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">epsilon</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">q1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">defaultdict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="k">lambda</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">q2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">defaultdict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="k">lambda</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rmse1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rmse2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>

    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">getDoubleQPolicy</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">state</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="sd">&quot;&quot;&quot;</span>
<span class="sd">        Choose A from S using greedy policy in Q1+Q2</span>
<span class="sd">        &quot;&quot;&quot;</span>
        <span class="n">actions</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">env</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">getLegalActions</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">state</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">max</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">actions</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">key</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="k">lambda</span> <span class="n">action</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">q1</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">state</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">action</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">q2</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">state</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">action</span><span class="p">])</span>

    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">double_q_learning</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">episodes</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">5000</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="n">expected_q</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get_expected_q</span><span class="p">()</span>
        <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">_</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">tqdm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">tqdm</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">episodes</span><span class="p">)):</span>  <span class="c1"># loop for each episode</span>
            <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">env</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">reset</span><span class="p">()</span>  <span class="c1"># Initialize S</span>
            <span class="k">while</span> <span class="ow">not</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">env</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">isTerminal</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">env</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">state</span><span class="p">):</span>  <span class="c1"># loop for each step of episode</span>
                <span class="n">state</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">env</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">state</span>  <span class="c1"># current state</span>
                <span class="n">action</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">getAction</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">state</span><span class="p">)</span>  <span class="c1"># Choose A from S using greedy policy in Q1+Q2</span>
                <span class="n">reward</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">next_state</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">env</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">step</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">action</span><span class="p">)</span>  <span class="c1"># Take action A, observe R, S&#39;</span>
                <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">random</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">random</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">:</span>   <span class="c1"># With 0.5 probability</span>
                    <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">qvalues</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">q1</span>
                    <span class="n">argmax_action</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">getPolicy</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">next_state</span><span class="p">)</span>    <span class="c1"># best action for next state</span>
                    <span class="n">diff</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">alpha</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">reward</span> <span class="o">+</span>
                                         <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">gamma</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">q2</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">next_state</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">argmax_action</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">-</span>
                                         <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">q1</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">state</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">action</span><span class="p">])</span>
                    <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">q1</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">state</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">action</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="n">diff</span>
                <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
                    <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">qvalues</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">q1</span>
                    <span class="n">argmax_action</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">getPolicy</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">next_state</span><span class="p">)</span>    <span class="c1"># best action for next state</span>
                    <span class="n">diff</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">alpha</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">reward</span> <span class="o">+</span>
                                         <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">gamma</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">q1</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">next_state</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">argmax_action</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">-</span>
                                         <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">q2</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">state</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">action</span><span class="p">])</span>
                    <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">q2</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">state</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">action</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="n">diff</span>  <span class="c1"># temporal difference update</span>
            <span class="n">error1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">getRMSError</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">expected_q</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">q1</span><span class="p">)</span>  <span class="c1"># store the Q1 RMS error per episode</span>
            <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rmse1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">error1</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="n">error2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">getRMSError</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">expected_q</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">q2</span><span class="p">)</span>  <span class="c1"># store the Q2 RMS error per episode</span>
            <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rmse2</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">error2</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">qvalues</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">q1</span>
        <span class="n">q1_policy</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="n">s</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">env</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">getPolicy</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">s</span><span class="p">)]</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">s</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">env</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">getStates</span><span class="p">()}</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">qvalues</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">q2</span>
        <span class="n">q2_policy</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="n">s</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">env</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">getPolicy</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">s</span><span class="p">)]</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">s</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">env</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">getStates</span><span class="p">()}</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">q1_policy</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">q2_policy</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>
